verses.text: Ach in Diosal, il in coti. Tz'el vav yuj yaelal tzin ik'ani. Cha ab' in lesal.
Ato b'aj slajvik'och sti' lum lum tik tzin avaj t'ayach, tz'el yip in pixan svab'i. Ik' in q'ue t'a yib'anh junok niwan q'ueen yic tzin colchaji.
Ha ach ayachoch in colnab'iloc. Icha junok cuartel aj t'ayin, tzin a col t'a eb' ayoch ajk'olal t'ayin.
In gana tzin cajnaj t'a a cajnub' t'a masanil tiempo. In gana tzin k'ub'ej in b'ha t'a yalanh a wach'k'olal, icha nok' yunetac caxlanh t'a yalanh sk'axil snun.
Ach in Diosal, ab'nac tas in ti' vak'nac t'ayach, ix ak' in macb'en yet' eb' ay elk'och t'ay.
Najatocab' tzutej in q'uinal a in rey in tik. Nivanocab' ab'il svila'
yic svak'an yajalil t'a ichanh. Tanhvej in yet' a wach'k'olal, yujto tz'elnhejk'och tas tzala'.
Icha chi' ol ach in b'itej t'a masanil tiempo. Junjun k'u ol in k'anab'ajan b'aj vak'nac in ti' chi' t'ayach.
